festival.introText: The Great Escape is THE festival to check out new music, with 500 new artists from across the globe in 30+ venues across the city and a festival site on Brighton Beach. Discover your new favourite artist and see them before they become the next big thing.
festival.location: Brighton Dome And Various Venues in Brighton

reviews.title: Review of The Great Escape 2018
reviews.body: Brilliant event, enormous number of acts to see and well organised with tight timings

reviews.title: Review of The Great Escape 2018
reviews.body: Amazing festival,  great atmosphere and music!

faqs.question: When is The Great Escape Festival 2023?
faqs.answer: The Great Escape Festival takes place Wednesday 10th May - Saturday 13th May 2023.

faqs.question: Is there on-site camping available at The Great Escape Festival?
faqs.answer: No, The Great Escape is a non-camping festival based in Brighton city centre. If you are attending for the full 3 days, we recommend you book and stay in one of Brighton's many hotels.

faqs.question: Accessibility information
faqs.answer: For full accessibility information, please contact info@greatescapefestival.com.

faqs.question: Where is The Great Escape Festival?
faqs.answer: The Great Escape Festival takes place in Brighton at over 30+ walkable venues across the city and a pop-up festival site on Brighton Beach.

faqs.question: Does The Great Escape Festival have any age restrictions?
faqs.answer: Yes, you must be 18+ to attend The Great Escape Festival, and you may require valid photo ID.

news.title: The festival experience with... The Snuts
news.summary: Ahead of their slot at this year's Great Escape festival in Brighton, we caught up with the West Lothian indie quartet.

news.title: Five of the best: Great Escape Festival
news.summary: A staple in the diary of any self respecting live music fan, Brighton's Great Escape returns this May with a plethora of emerging talent in tow, and we have selected 5 of our must sees.

news.title: More artists join The Great Escape line up
news.summary: Idles, The Regrettes and The Vryll Society are amongst 100 names confirmed. Find out how to get Great Escape Festival tickets.
